page.title: 06 MONKTON STORES.
page.content: We went to interview Ian at Monkton Stores _the{only shop}in our survey area . He has been working at the shop for five years. Ian likes being his {own boss,}and making friends with people that use his shop regularly.The shop is open on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesday mornings, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturday mornings.In the days when the shop is closed he does paperwork at home. There are always{two}people in the shop:one to run the{post office and to serve{groceries.}There are two part-time assistants.At one time there would be specially baked bread and other locally- produced food for sale but now convenience foods are popular with customers.Almost all the customers come from Monkton Farleigh, Farleigh Rise or South Wraxall.They like the personal service in a village shop.
